textos_fuente.text: Verandah Golf Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Fort Myers Golf Communities Verandah Golf Club Verandah Golf Club is an exclusive private golf club located in Fort Myers Florida. At Verandah, there are two luxury golf courses offering the ultimate player’s experience. The original golf course, Old Orange, was designed by Robert Cupp. The second course, Whispering Oak, was designed by Jack Nicklaus and Jack Nicklaus II. Verandah combines a laid back lifestyle with exceptional amenities. In addition to two of the best 18-hole championship golf courses, first-class practice facilities, the club offers members a full-service clubhouse with both casual and fine dining, fitness center, resort-style heated pool, five lighted har-tru tennis courts and 9 miles of walking trails. An especially unique amenity is the 2,500-square-foot River House restaurant overlooking the Orange River. The members-only restaurant includes a full-service bar and plenty of seating to sit back, relax, and enjoy lunch or dinner. Additionally, it’s one of the few golf communities with a private dog park. So if you are looking for a pet-friendly golf community, you just can’t beat Verandah. The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities, contact us today for more information. Please call 1.833.501.1928 to schedule a free appointment with a technician to update your equipment at no additional cost. Our residents who are not presently in Verandah, will be able to reach out to Xfinity upon their return to coordinate in-home installation. Click to Read: Nuisance Wildlife Information View Envera FAQ receipt Financials View now → support 24/7 Support Click for Information → list_alt Forms View now → payment Make a Payment Pay now → event Events View calendar → About Our Community Verandah, located on 1,456 acres along a 1.75-mile stretch of the Orange River, is a master-planned gated community that opened in 2003 and was originally developed by The Bonita Bay Group.  In planning Verandah, care was taken to expand the wetland, uplands and conservation areas, impact as few trees as possible, and develop an easement along the Orange River to ensure the future integrity of our ecosystem. Nearly 65% of our community is reserved for open space, including lakes, preserves, parks, nine miles of walking trails, golf, and a buffer along the river. In addition to being lush with native plants and trees, Verandah is home to a diverse species of Florida wildlife including the gentle manatees, who in season swim alongside your kayak on the Orange River.  The Verandah Homeowners Association is governed by a homeowner elected Board of Directors.  Verandah is also home to the Verandah Club consisting of two golf courses, club house, tennis courts, and other amenities. Contact Us Verandah Community Association 11390 Palm Beach Blvd, First Floor Fort Myers, FL 33905 (239) 694-6358 Office@vcalife.com RealManage Customer Support 458 N. Tamiami Trail, Osprey, FL 34229 (866) 473-2573 Community Manager James Tanigawa JamesT@VCALife.com Director of CAM Operations, South/SW Florida Region James Tanigawa James.Tanigawa@RealManage.com Senior Vice President Of Operations Stephanie Burtwell Stephanie.Burtwell@RealManage.com © 2025 Verandah • All Rights Reserved
